      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  FSEditLogOp.AddCloseOp 
      (package private) static class  FSEditLogOp.AddOp
      @AtMostOnce for ClientProtocol.create(java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsPermission, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.io.EnumSetWritable<org.apache.hadoop.fs.CreateFlag>, boolean, short, long, org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CryptoProtocolVersion[]) and ClientProtocol.append(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.io.EnumSetWritable<org.apache.hadoop.fs.CreateFlag>)
      (package private) static class  FSEditLogOp.CloseOp
      Although ClientProtocol.append(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.io.EnumSetWritable<org.apache.hadoop.fs.CreateFlag>) may also log a close op, we do not need to record the rpc ids here since a successful appendFile op will finally log an AddOp.
      (package private) static class  FSEditLogOp.UpdateBlocksOp
      @AtMostOnce for ClientProtocol.updatePipeline(java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.ExtendedBlock, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.ExtendedBlock, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.DatanodeID[], java.lang.String[]), but @Idempotent for some other ops.
